SetList.Name: Genetic Apex (A1)
SetList.Info:
Genetic Apex (A1) is the very first set of Pokemon TCG Pocket.
It is heavily focused on Generation 1 Pokémon (Kanto) with all their starters, gym leaders and iconic Pokémon.
It re-uses TCG artworks from the Base set onward. The booster packs are available in 3 variants: Pikachu, Charizard and Mewtwo.
The set has a total of 226 ◊ cards + 60 ☆ rare counterparts.

SetList.Name: Promo-A (P-A)
SetList.Info:
Promo A (P-A) is the generic promotional set for the A series.
Cards can be obtained through the Shop, Events, Premium Missions, and other methods.

SetList.Name: Mythical Island (A1a)
SetList.Info:
Mythical Island (A1a) is the first mini-set of Pokémon TCG Pocket and the second set following Genetic Apex.
The set is themed around a mysterious island inhabited by Mew and several other Mythical Pokémon.
It offers a single type of booster pack, featuring Mew on the cover. The set has a total of 68 ◊ cards + 18 ☆ rare counterparts.

SetList.Name: Space-Time Smackdown (A2)
SetList.Info:
Space-Time Smackdown (A2) is the second set of Pokemon TCG Pocket.
It is heavily focused on Generation 4 Pokémon (Sinnoh, first introduced in Diamond & Pearl) with all their starters, iconic trainers and Pokémon.
The booster packs are available in 2 variants: Dialga and Palkia.
The set contains a total of 155 ◊ cards + 52 ☆ and ♕ rare counterparts.

SetList.Name: Triumphant Light (A2a)
SetList.Info:
Triumphant Light (A2a) is the second mini-set of Pokémon TCG Pocket, complementing Space-Time Smackdown.
The set is themed around Arceus, Trainers and Pokémon from the Sinnoh and Hisui region.
It offers a single type of booster pack, featuring Arceus on the cover.
The set has a total of 75 ◊ cards + 21 ☆ and ♕ rare counterparts.

SetList.Name: Shining Revelry (A2b)
SetList.Info:
Shining Revelry (A2b) is the third mini-set of Pokémon TCG Pocket and the second mini-set complementing Space-Time Smackdown.
The set introduces Shiny Pokémon and two new Shiny Rarities.
It also features the first Pokémon from the Paldea region (Pokémon Scarlet/Violet) in Pokémon TCG Pocket.
It offers a single type of booster pack featuring Shiny Pokémon on the cover.
The set has a total of 78 ◊ cards + 25 ☆ and ♕ rare counterparts + 16 ✵ shiny counterparts.

SetList.Name: Celestial Guardians (A3)
SetList.Info:
Celestial Guardians (A3) is the third big expansion of Pokémon TCG Pocket.
It is focused on Generation 7 Pokémon (Alola, first introduced in the video game Pokémon Sun & Moon), including multiple variants of the starters, Alolan captains and legendary Pokémon.
The booster packs are available in 2 variants: Solgaleo and Lunala.
The set contains a total of 155 ◊ cards + 84 ☆ ✵ and ♕ counterparts.

SetList.Name: Extradimensional Crisis (A3a)
SetList.Info:
Extradimensional Crisis (A3a) is the fourth mini-set of Pokémon TCG Pocket and the first mini-set complementing Celestial Guardians.
The set still takes place in Alola (generation 7) and introduces Ultra Beasts, with the first appearance of a specific label in Pokémon TCG Pocket.
It offers a single type of booster pack featuring Ultra Beasts Pokémon on the cover.
The set has a total of 69 ◊ cards + 19 ☆ and 1 ♕ rare counterparts + 14 ✵ shiny reprints of previous Pokémon printed in Genetic Apex.

SetList.Name: Eevee Grove (A3b)
SetList.Info:
Eevee Grove (A3b) is the fifth mini-set of Pokémon TCG Pocket and the second mini-set complementing Celestial Guardians.
This set features Eevee and all its evolutions, to celebrate the Year of the Eevee.
It offers a single type of booster pack featuring Eevee(lutions) on the cover.
The set has a total of 69 ◊ cards + 23 ☆ and 1 ♕ rare counterparts + 14 ✵ shiny counterparts reprints.

SetList.Name: Wisdom of Sea and Sky (A4)
SetList.Info:
Wisdom of Sea and Sky (A4) is the fourth big expansion of Pokémon TCG Pocket.
It is focused on Generation 2 Pokémon (Johto, first introduced in the video game Pokémon Gold & Silver), including Baby Pokémon and legendary Pokémon.
The booster packs are available in 2 variants: Lugia and Ho-Oh.
The set contains a total of 161 ◊ cards + 80 ☆ ✵ and ♕ counterparts.
There's a 8.3% chance that any pack contains 6 cards, where the 6th card is a Baby Pokémon.

SetList.Name: Secluded Springs (A4a)
SetList.Info:
Secluded Springs (A4a) is the sixth mini-set of Pokémon TCG Pocket and the first mini-set complementing Wisdom of Sea and Sky.
This set keeps on exploring the Johto region, but also introduces many Pokémon from Hoenn.
It offers a single type of booster pack featuring Suicune on the cover.
The set has a total of 71 ◊ cards + 19 ☆ and 1 ♕ rare counterparts + 14 ✵ shiny counterparts reprints.
There's a 8.3% chance that any pack contains 6 cards, where the 6th card is a Baby Pokémon.

SetList.Name: Deluxe Pack ex (A4b)
SetList.Info:
Deluxe Pack: ex (A4b) is the seventh mini-set of Pokémon TCG Pocket and the first ever "reprint expansion" in Pokémon TCG Pocket.
It's entirely comprised of reprints of cards from Genetic Apex (A1) to Wisdom of Sea and Sky (A4), notably featuring all Pokémon ex released in these sets.
All cards of rarity Common ◊ Uncommon ◊◊ and Rare ◊◊◊ have a rarer parallel foil counterpart, with regular borders but a special shine.
All cards of rarity including ☆ have a completely new artwork.
The set has a total of 353 ◊ cards + 23 ☆ and 1 ♕ rare counterparts + 2 ✵ shiny counterparts reprints.

SetList.Name: Promo-B (P-B)
SetList.Info:
Promo B (P-B) is the generic promotional set for the B series.
Cards can be obtained through the Shop, Events, Premium Missions, and other methods.

SetList.Name: Mega Rising (B1)
SetList.Info:
Mega Rising (B4) is the fifth big expansion of Pokémon TCG Pocket and the first set of the new B series.
Exploring many regions of the Pokémon games, it's also the first set to introduce Mega Pokémon ex, with much more power than usual Pokémon ex but giving out 3 points when Knocked Out.
The booster packs are available in 3 variants: Mega Gyarados, Mega Blaziken and Mega Altaria.
The set contains a total of 226 ◊ cards + 60 ☆ counterparts, 3 ♕ counterparts and 42 ✵ Pokémon.
Starting this set, Shiny Pokémon ✵ will be there at the 6th spot of a booster pack.

SetList.Name: Crimson Blaze (B1a)
SetList.Info:
Crimson Blaze (B1a) is the seventh mini-set of Pokémon TCG Pocket and the first mini-set complementing Mega Rising.
This set introduces more Mega Evolutions from several regions with more Supporters from Kalos.
It offers a single type of booster pack featuring Mega Charizard Y on the cover.
The set has a total of 69 ◊ cards + 18 ☆ and 2 ♕ rare counterparts + 14 ✵ shiny counterparts reprints.
